channel.title: Lateral Root on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Lateral Root on funPlantGenes

item.title: BIGE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb211050 Gene Symbol: BIGE1 Gene Name: Big embryo 1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: BnaA2.NIP5;1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA02G0242800 Gene Symbol: BnaA2.NIP5 1 Gene Name: Genome: Darmor-bzh reference genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Specific and multiple-target gene silencing reveals function diversity of BnaA2.

item.title: BnaA3.NIP5;1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA03C0265800 Gene Symbol: BnaA3.NIP5;1 Gene Name: Genome: Darmor-bzh reference genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Specific and multiple-target gene silencing reveals function diversity of BnaA2.

item.title: BnHO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnHO1 Gene Name: heme oxygenase 1 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnHO1, a haem oxygenase-1 gene from Brassica napus, is required for salinity and osmotic stress-induced lateral root formation.

item.title: BUZZ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi3g46007 Gene Symbol: BUZZ Gene Name: Genome: reference Bd21 genome Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: BUZZ: an essential gene for postinitiation root hair growth and a mediator of root architecture in Brachypodium distachyon.

item.title: Cg1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GRMZM5G838324 Gene Symbol: Cg1 Gene Name: Corngrass1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g46330 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0666100 Gene Symbol: CRL4 OsGNOM1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CsAAP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_4G030920;Csa4G470690 Gene Symbol: CsAAP2 Gene Name: Amino Acid Permease 2 Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Disruption of the amino acid transporter CsAAP2 inhibits auxin-mediated root development in cucumber.

item.title: CsAAP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa4G470690 Gene Symbol: CsAAP2 Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v3 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsAAP2 knockout lines exhibited arrested development of root meristem, which then caused the delayed initiation of lateral root and the inhibition of root elongation.

item.title: CsUGT84J2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA000239 Gene Symbol: CsUGT84J2 Gene Name: Al-induced glycosyltransferase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Found that flavonol glycoside levels in tea roots increased following Al treatment, and the Al-induced UDP glycosyltransferase CsUGT84J2 was involved in this mechanism.

item.title: EL5
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g35329 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0559800 Gene Symbol: EL5 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: GmEIL4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02g274600 Gene Symbol: GmEIL4 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmEIL4 enhances soybean (Glycine max) phosphorus efficiency by improving root system development.

item.title: GmNPLa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.11G244800 Gene Symbol: GmNPLa Gene Name: phosphate starvation-induced transcription factor 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmNPLa was specifically induced by rhizobium inoculation in root hairs.

item.title: GmPTF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.19g143900 Gene Symbol: GmPTF1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmPTF1 modifies root architecture responses to phosphate starvation primarily through regulating GmEXPB2 expression in soybean.

item.title: GmPTF1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.19G143900 Gene Symbol: GmPTF1a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Molecular module GmPTF1a/b-GmNPLa regulates rhizobia infection and nodule formation in soybean.

item.title: GmPTF1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.03G143900 Gene Symbol: GmPTF1b Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Molecular module GmPTF1a/b-GmNPLa regulates rhizobia infection and nodule formation in soybean.

item.title: GmWNK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmWNK1 Gene Name: WNK kinase homolog1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The soybean root-specific protein kinase GmWNK1 regulates stress-responsive ABA signaling on the root system architecture.

item.title: LaCLE35
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lalb_Chr05g0213851 Gene Symbol: LaCLE35 Gene Name: Genome: Species: lupinus albus Functional Descriptions: The LaCLE35 peptide modifies rootlet density and length in cluster roots of white lupin.

item.title: LaTRE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lalb_Chr05g0223881 Gene Symbol: LaTRE1 Gene Name: TREHALASE1 Genome: Species: Lupinus albus Functional Descriptions: Under P deficiency, validamycin A treatment, which inhibits trehalase, led to the accumulation of trehalose and promoted the formation of CR with enhanced organic acid production, whereas overexpression of the white lupin TREHALASE1 (LaTRE1) led to decreased trehalose levels, lateral rootlet density, and organic acid production.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjSYP32-1 Gene Name: Sed5 -like SNARE Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: We identified a Sed5 -like clone LjSYP32-1 which contributes to nodule tissue formation and plant growth in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: MtNAC969
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtNAC969 Gene Name: NAC969 transcription factor Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Over-expression of one of these transcription factors, MtNAC969, induced formation of a shorter and less-branched root system, whereas RNAi-mediated MtNAC969 inactivation promoted lateral root formation.

item.title: MtNOOT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr7g090020.1 Gene Symbol: MtNOOT1 Gene Name: NODULE ROOT1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The Medicago truncatula nodule identity gene MtNOOT1 is required for coordinated apical-basal development of the root.
